mapper.select: select DEAL_NUM, DEAL_ID, DEAL_SUBJECT, DEAL_CONTENT, DEAL_REGION, DEAL_IMG, DEAL_READCOUNT, DEAL_DATETIME from TB_DEAL order by DEAL_NUM desc
mapper.insert: insert into TB_DEAL (DEAL_NUM, DEAL_ID, DEAL_SUBJECT, DEAL_CONTENT, DEAL_REGION, DEAL_IMG, DEAL_READCOUNT, DEAL_DATETIME) values (#{DEAL_NUM},#{DEAL_ID},#{DEAL_SUBJECT},#{DEAL_CONTENT},#{DEAL_REGION},#{DEAL_IMG},#{DEAL_READCOUNT},#{DEAL_DATETIME})
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_DEAL SET DEAL_SUBJECT = #{DEAL_SUBJECT},DEAL_CONTENT=#{DEAL_CONTENT},DEAL_REGION=#{DEAL_REGION}, DEAL_IMG=#{DEAL_IMG} WHERE DEAL_NUM=#{DEAL_NUM}
mapper.select: SELECT DEAL_NUM,DEAL_ID,DEAL_SUBJECT,DEAL_CONTENT,DEAL_REGION,DEAL_IMG,DEAL_READCOUNT,DEAL_DATETIME FROM TB_DEAL WHERE DEAL_NUM>0 ORDER BY DEAL_NUM DESC,DEAL_DATETIME DESC LIMIT #{PAGENUM},#{AMOUNT}
